title: ChatterBox
message:
A.J.A.X. - asynchronous javascript and XML

R.E.S.T. - Representational State Transfer

HTTP method - 
- Get - retrieve
- Post - add
- Put - update 
- Options

Rest Api?

Endpoints - instead of file path

Event Systems - keep servers up to date?

State = Something that is likely to change

Attr = Properties, things that aren't likely to change
